name: SCNDebugOptions
desc: Options for drawing overlays with SceneKit content that can aid in debugging, used with the debugOptions property.

items.name: static var showBoundingBoxes: SCNDebugOptions
items.desc: Display the bounding boxes for any nodes with content.

items.name: static var showWireframe: SCNDebugOptions
items.desc: Display geometries in the scene with wireframe rendering.

items.name: static var renderAsWireframe: SCNDebugOptions
items.desc: Display only wireframe placeholders for geometries in the scene.

items.name: static var showSkeletons: SCNDebugOptions
items.desc: Display visualizations of the skeletal animation parameters for relevant geometries.

items.name: static var showCreases: SCNDebugOptions
items.desc: Display nonsmoothed crease regions for geometries affected by surface subdivision.

items.name: static var showConstraints: SCNDebugOptions
items.desc: Display visualizations of the constraint objects acting on nodes in the scene.

items.name: static var showCameras: SCNDebugOptions
items.desc: Display visualizations for nodes in the scene with attached cameras and their fields of view.

items.name: static var showLightInfluences: SCNDebugOptions
items.desc: Display the locations of each SCNLight object in the scene.

items.name: static var showLightExtents: SCNDebugOptions
items.desc: Display the regions affected by each SCNLight object in the scene.

items.name: static var showPhysicsShapes: SCNDebugOptions
items.desc: Display the physics shapes for any nodes with attached SCNPhysicsBody objects.

items.name: static var showPhysicsFields: SCNDebugOptions
items.desc: Display the regions affected by each SCNPhysicsField object in the scene.

items.name: static let showFeaturePoints: SCNDebugOptions
items.desc: Display a point cloud showing intermediate results of the scene analysis that ARKit uses to track device position.

items.name: static let showWorldOrigin: SCNDebugOptions
items.desc: Display a coordinate axis visualization indicating the position and orientation of the AR world coordinate system.
